pages.text: $(tool)Item Magnet$() pulls dropped items toward you while you're holding the jeweled tool!$(br2)Never worry about items falling into lava or despawning while mining.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(D8D8D8)Iron Ingot$() grants $(tool)Item Magnet +2$()$(br2)Magnetic personality for your tools!

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: While holding a tool with Item Magnet:$(br2)$(li)Nearby items are pulled toward you$(li)Range increases with level$(li)Works even when not mining$(li)Helps collect mob drops too!$(br2)$(important)Level 2$() provides a decent range.

pages.title: Pro Tips
pages.text: $(li)Great for strip mining$(li)Prevents loss in lava$(li)Useful in The End$(li)Combine with $(tool)Vein Miner$() for auto-collection$(li)Stack for massive range!$(br2)$(o)All the loot, none of the chasing!$()
